data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Niogret, Jerome, Nicot, Antoine, Stordeur, Eric De, Bertrand, Michel (2007): Combination of morphological characters and ITS­sequence to characterize a new species of Macrocheles (Acari: Macrochelidae). Zootaxa 1386: 19-29, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.175139
